timeline.message:
Rework inspection of tenant permissions results in tests

The X-Tenant-Perms-Result was used to return permissions that
were posted (_tenantPermissions). A very bad idea when permissions
can become larger than 8k. Instead header module has a service
to retrieve most recently permissions (/permResult).
Test trace header for system call
